markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shark Tooth Charm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2992)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=709" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 267 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 23 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This dried-seaweed bracelet is lined with charms shaped like small shark teeth. When you activate the bracelet, attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) using Acrobatics with a +1 item bonus to the check. If you roll a success, you get a critical success instead (if you roll a critical failure, you get a failure instead). If you fail the Acrobatics check against a grabbing creature, the creature must either release you as a free action or take 2d8 piercing damage as shark's teeth momentarily emerge from your skin.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Shark Tooth Charm
